metadata.name: Spine Girl
metadata.description:
I like to draw.
In the past, I was a mechanic on a Maritime escort ship.
Then I gained the skill to draw machine.
I also like martial arts, and I like to draw bones and muscles.
The structure of the human body is very mysterious.

Machines are inorganic.
Muscles and bones are organic.
They are like water and oil, so to speak.

Bone Mechanical Girls 
My work is a good fusion of the two.
The actual structure of moving muscles and bones is very mysterious.
The time has come when we can express them with machines.

I imagination such a future and creation it with my paintings.

Character: @Kuitai_Oniku
CG design: @NEzU_ch
